comment: He won't take "I don't know" for an answer, so if you really don't know how to work out a problem you are better off asking a fellow student. A third of my class dropped within the first 3 weeks. Our TA knew nothing, I learned more from another student taking the course. His grading of lab reports is also all over the place and not very consistent
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Tough grader

comment: He is a great teacher. Gen Chem 2 is hard but he makes it easy. He always curve the exams. Homeworks are easy and only 8-10 question each and good chunk of the grade. Quizes are similar to his PP examples. I would take it again. ACS exam is a hell tho so make sure you complete homeworks and quizes to gurantee at least B
rating_tags: Graded by few things--Clear grading criteria--EXTRA CREDIT
